newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungarians rush to see hatching dinosaur.
newsitem.headline: Hungarians rush to see hatching dinosaur.

text.p: Budapest Zoo was swamped by enquiries by people anxious to see a hatching dinosaur egg, following an April Fool's Day newspaper report.
"Our phone lines have been jammed since early morning," zoo manager Istvan Zahar told Reuters. "Everybody wants to see the dinosaur".

The national daily Magyar Hirlap reported on Tuesday that a 17-strong team of scientists had revived a dinosaur egg found last year in Hungary and a dinosaur baby could emerge from the egg within 24 hours.
